label: Full ROM
short_description: The exercise is performed through the entire anatomically safe range of motion. This is the baseline for all scoring.

label: Partial (Bottom)
short_description: Performing only the portion of the rep where the muscle is under the greatest stretch. Highly effective for hypertrophy.

label: Partial (Top)
short_description: Performing only the portion of the rep where the muscle is fully shortened. Focuses on peak tension and lockout strength.

label: Deficit / Extended
short_description: Increasing the ROM beyond the standard floor or neutral position (e.g., standing on a plate). Increases injury risk but maximizes muscle stretch.

label: Limited (Internal)
short_description: Intentionally stopping the movement before full depth (usually due to a physical barrier like the floor). Focuses load on the mid-to-top range.
